remarks: A finite sum multiplied by a constant.  (Contributed by NM, 12-Nov-2005.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Apr-2014.)
statement:
fsummulc2.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) $.
fsummulc2.2 $e |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) $.
fsummulc2.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> B e. CC ) $.
fsummulc2 $p |- ( ph -> ( C x. sum_ k e. A B ) = sum_ k e. A ( C x. B ) ) $.
$d A k $.
$d C k $.
$d k ph $.
